name: Sugar Plum Tree
tag_list: kids-clothes, childrens-clothes, baby-clothes, babies, baby-gear, newborns
overview:
Sugar Plum Tree specialises in designer clothing for newborn babies,baby boy clothes and girls clothing, as well as everyday products and essentials for new mums. Products including baby slings, hip seat, baby carriers, baby blankets, rompers, baby sleepsuits, and designer toys and gifts for babies.

Sugar Plum Tree’s ranges of children’s clothing for both baby boys and girls come from France, Denmark and the UK, including Darcy Brown. Our French children’s clothing ranges include Petit Bateau and Danish favourite Phister and Philina. We have possibly the best Phister and Philina range you will find online. We also have some great deals and cheap baby clothes during our sale from No Added Sugar. So if you want some cheap bargains and low prices check out our baby sale sections.

We source both established and exciting new designers from all over the world. As your one-stop designer boutique shop for baby and children’s gifts, baby bags and accessories, you know you’ll only find the very best at Sugar Plum Tree.
